name: Little Puppy Car Spa
description:
Little Puppy is going to give a spa to a car,help a puppy to do a car Spa.Download this game and make a car spa.Follow the Guided steps And Wash A Car,There are Different tools To wash a car,Select Tools and Clean Your Car.After Washing a car,design a car style with your own creativity.and make a lot's of fun,there are different styles,colours,models of car,choose your favourite one and share your creativity with your friends.

Key Features of this game

-> Choose Your Favourite car and apply your creativity on it

-> Select tools,as given in the guided steps

-> Apply different themes on car and make your dream car

download this game and make a lot's of fun
